name: LapTask Technology
overview:
LapTask.com is your venue for online contests, community, and knowledge sharing. Specifically, LapTask falls under the title of “crowdsourcing”; however, we prefer CompetitiveSourcing. Our venue is the perfect arena for a host* to come with a need in mind and challenge a large community of users** who will compete for the predetermined award; ultimately, resulting in a successful ending for everyone involved. With this in mind, LapTask.com is your venue to 1) host or compete in contests of your choosing, 2) communicate and meet people with similar interests, and 3) engage in topical conversations that truly matter to you.

*business, university, group/organization, or individual ** students, professionals, freelancers, or members of a host organization
